name: collections::btree::node::Handle::<collections::btree::node::NodeRef<collections::btree::node::marker::Mut<'a>, K, V, NodeType>, collections::btree::node::marker::KV>::key_mut

collections::btree::node::NodeRef::<coll.doc:
Borrows exclusive access to an element of the key storage area.

 # Safety
 `index` is in bounds of 0..CAPACITY
